title: The Mystery of the Indian Temple (1963 Adventure) Escape from royal captive to cult target

sources.title: The Mystery of the Indian Temple (1963 Adventure) Escape from royal captive to cult target
sources.description:
Wrongly imprisoned by the Maharajah of Hasnabad for a British officer's death, Doctor Palmer and his devoted assistant Gopal plot a daring escape. With the help of Amrita, who harbors feelings for Palmer, they break free, hoping to clear his name and evade recapture.

Original title: Le Myst√®re du temple hindou (Il mistero del tempio indiano) 

Director: Mario Camerini
Writers: Leonardo Benvenuti, Piero De Bernardi, Guy Elmes
Actors: Paul Guers, Senta Berger, Lex Barker, Claudine Auger, Joachim Hansen
Genres: French / Italian cinema, Adventure, Fantasy
Release date: November 21, 1963 (Italy)

@CultCinemaClassics
